name: Experience The Mekong Delta on 2 wheels
description: Take a short motorbike excursion out of Saigon and into the rich Vietnamese landscape covered by lush, green rice paddies, quiet rivers and an area with rich local flavour. Visit the historical site of Lăng Hoàng Gia palace in Go Cong lying on the coastline of Tieng Giang province, and take in the beauty of the vast cherry plantations. Enjoy a beachfront lunch as you gaze over hundreds of clam collectors hard at work off shore. In Ben Tre, ‘The Coconut Kingdom’, have a lovely stay in a home stay deep in the jungle, experience the local industries of hand crafted brooms, coconut factories, mat-weaving workshops and brick factories. Cap off the day with lunch in a traditional Mekong Delta house.
